item.title: On Reading: Advice for Young People in Their Twenties
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description: When it comes to reading, giving advice feels almost unnecessary; true lovers of reading will naturally develop their own methods and preferences. One book often leads us to another, effortlessly drawing us into new ideas and stories. I imagine many of you have had a similar experience.
